rules_text: Destroy target nonland permanent. If an artifact was destroyed this way, create a Treasure token. If a creature was destroyed this way, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. If an enchantment was destroyed this way, create a Shard token. [i](A Shard token is an enchantment with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]
